message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm the one who will do all the work!
You're not getting it all, Bob! I'll give you 400k, but I'm still the majority owner!
You're being greedy, Alice! I'm willing to give you a fair share
You're not getting away with the majority, Bob! I'm taking 70% of the pie!
I'm starting to get worried, Alice. Let's split it down the middle before it's too late!
You're getting close to being left with nothing, Bob. I'm taking 80% of the pie, and you're getting a small slice!
I'm not going to let you take everything, Alice. I'm taking the majority share this time!
You're running out of time, Bob. I'm taking 90% of the pie, and you're getting a tiny crumb!
I'm not going to let you take everything, Alice. I'm taking the majority share, and you're getting a tiny fraction!
You're almost out of time, Bob. I'm taking 95% of the pie, and you're getting a tiny fraction. It's your last chance to accept!
I'm not leaving with nothing, Alice. I'm taking almost everything, and you're getting a tiny amount. It's my last offer!
